bio: I'm a Senior Angular Architect and Frontend Platform Lead with 8+ years of enterprise experience, owning the full-stack Angular strategy for a $50M+/month banking institution at Primus Software.

My edge is systematic mastery under pressure — I drove Angular v6→v19 migrations with zero regressions, designed zone-less Signal architectures improving core web vitals by 40%, and built a production RAG platform from scratch in 6 weeks in a regulated financial environment.

I don't just integrate AI — I architect compliance-ready GenAI pipelines with hallucination mitigation, source attribution, and full observability. Every system I ship is production-ready, auditable, and built to last.

philosophies.title: Architecture Philosophy
philosophies.text: I treat frontend as a product discipline — not just UI implementation. Every architectural decision is evaluated on longevity, team scalability, and observable performance impact. I formalize decisions through ADRs and architecture guilds to make institutional knowledge durable.

philosophies.title: Angular Internals Depth
philosophies.text: Ivy renderer internals, zone-less change detection, @defer-first loading models, Signal fine-grained reactivity, and custom schematic-driven migration tooling. I've authored internal playbooks on Signals migration and @defer adoption that are now standard across the org.

philosophies.title: GenAI Engineering Approach
philosophies.text: Production AI in regulated environments requires more than a chat widget. My stack includes 5-layer hallucination mitigation, source-attribution UI, intent-aware prompt routing, and LangSmith/Arize Phoenix observability — every output auditable by compliance teams.

philosophies.title: Knowledge Sharing
philosophies.text: Delivered Angular platform talks at Primus — Signals migration playbook, custom schematics strategy, @defer-first loading model. Ran an 18-month structured mentorship programme growing 3 junior engineers to mid-level.

Built production RAG platform from zero GenAI knowledge in 6 weeks: LangChain + FAISS IVF-PQ, sub-500ms p95 retrieval on 50k documents, 5-layer hallucination mitigation, full observability stack.
Established architecture guild, formalized ADRs. 95% sprint adherence over 18 months as C-suite technical liaison. Grew 3 junior developers to mid-level through structured mentorship.
